text: Hi guys, has anyone retrieved content from HubDB in an email template?
no. What are you wondering about? If you have a working one for a webpage I would just try to put that in the email and see how it goes
I don't see why it wouldn't work
you would just need to define the paramaters inside the email
looking to add rows from a HubDB table to an email based on an query
I'm going to bet that it works out of the box
You can use hubdb in email templates, but you cannot currently display different content for different email recipients
<@U22PJPGK0>:  so no way to query based on email address and time?

emails are sent in a two step process. The first step is where the page is rendered and any hubdb calls are made The second step is where the email is customized for each particular recipient, so itâ€™s too late for hubdb at that point.
